entry.def: Polyunsaturated oils and margarines are made mainly from vegetable fats and are considered healthier than those made from animal fats.

example.ex: Use poly8.5unsaturated spread instead of butter.
example.tran: 用多不饱和抹酱取代黄油。

means.word_mean: 1. (of long-chain carbon compounds especially fats) having many unsaturated bonds
